accept","_maxWithdraw":"The maximum amount that can be withdrawn per transaction"}},"deposit()":{"details":"Uses withinBankCap modifier to ensure deposit doesn't exceed bank capacityEmits DepositMade event on success"},"getDepositCount(address)":{"params":{"user":"The address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"The number of deposits"}},"getVaultBalance(address)":{"params":{"user":"The address to check the balance for"},"returns":{"_0":"The balance of the specified user"}},"getWithdrawalCount(address)":{"params":{"user":"The address to check"},"returns":{"_0":"The number of withdrawals"}},"withdraw(uint256)":{"details":"Follows checks-effects-interactions pattern to prevent reentrancyEmits WithdrawalMade event on success","params":{"amount":"The amount of ETH to withdraw"}}},"title":"KipuBank","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"BankCapExceeded()":[{"notice":"Error thrown when a deposit would exceed the bank's total deposit
